def: to learn English
ex: I study English after class.
ex_kor: 나는 수업이 끝난 후 영어를 공부한다.

def: to have food in the morning
ex: We eat breakfast together.

def: to lie down to sleep
ex: I go to bed at ten.

def: to wash your body with water
ex: She takes a shower every night.

def: to enjoy songs or sounds
ex: I listen to music every day.

def: to complete school assignments
ex: He does his homework at night.

def: to rest your body and mind
ex: The baby sleeps all night.

def: to clean your face with water
ex: He washes his face before school.
ex_kor: 그는 학교에 가기 전에 세수를 한다.

def: to make food for the evening meal
ex: Mom cooks dinner every night.

def: to make your room tidy
ex: She cleans her room on Sundays.

def: to look at shows on television
ex: She watches TV after dinner.
ex_kor: 그녀는 저녁 식사 후 TV를 본다.

def: to clean your teeth with a brush
ex: I brush my teeth every morning.

def: to give food to your dog
ex: He feeds the dog every morning.
ex_kor: 그는 매일 아침 강아지에게 밥을 준다.

def: to look at and understand written words
ex: I read a book before bed.

def: to eat food in the afternoon
ex: We have lunch at noon.

def: to clean plates and cups
ex: I wash the dishes after dinner.
ex_kor: 나는 저녁 식사 후 설거지를 한다.

def: to travel to school
ex: They go to school by bus.

def: to put on clothes
ex: I get dressed quickly.

def: to sleep for a short time
ex: Dad takes a nap after lunch.

def: to stop sleeping
ex: I wake up at seven.
